item.description:
Dance & $3. Martinis

Saturday Oct. 22nd. 7:30 pm.

Nashua NH.

Junkyard Night Club

522 Amerst st.

www.junkyardnightclub.com

$3. Martinis and Cosmos only from 8 to 10 pm.

Host: Steve O. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

This is a new club. But we have been there before. When it was the called the Sky Lounge.  We had 45 people  join us the last time we were there. The day cor has changed. But it still has a good dance floor with a Dj play new sounds to dance to. So, please join Steve O. and friends as we test out a new location, for an evening of dancing and drinks. Seat will be very difficult to hold on too, and Steve O. will be introducing everyone as they join us. So please, get there as close to 7:30 as possible. When everyone is on the dance floor, introduction are even more difficult.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group
